trust.heading: Built with families in mind
trust.copy: We focus on clarity, local context, and the community voice so decisions are informed.

idea.heading: The goal of Shkoli.bg
idea.left: We connect people to nearby schools in Bulgarian community centers, with the confidence that every decision is informed by real needs and accessible resources.
idea.right: Our goal is for your school choice to reflect your goals, location, and budget, while also promoting the work of community centers.

discovery.title: Easy search
discovery.text: Find schools by your interests, needs, and location.

guidance.title: Wide coverage
guidance.text: We work with Bulgarian community centers in Sofia, Varna, Plovdiv, and Burgas.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.text: Compare what matters - time, price, results - in no time.

community.title: Community
community.text: Share your experience with others and learn from them.

flow.heading: A clear path from search to choice
flow.copy: Choose an area, filter by key criteria, and compare programs side by side.

location.title: Start with your area
location.text: Choose a neighborhood or city to see the closest options.

filters.title: Focus the results
filters.text: Use goals, schedule, and budget to narrow the list.

compare.title: Compare with context
compare.text: See key details in one place and choose confidently.

panel.title: Everything important at a glance
panel.copy: Each option shows the details families look for most often.

support.heading: Clarity that supports every decision
support.copy: We highlight what matters most, explain the trade-offs, and keep every step focused on what is important for your family.
support.primaryAlt: Parent reviewing learning options on a laptop
support.secondaryAlt: Illustration of students reading and studying

guided.title: Guided steps
guided.text: Short guidance surfaces the right details at the right moment.

confident.title: Confident choice
confident.text: Comparing in one place makes trade-offs clear without overload.

footer.tagline: Clear and local school discovery for families and communities.
